column5: I legit think this is why I have extreme mood swings. Like. Everything will be great one minute then my anxiety kicks in by one little comment I or someone else makes. I start over thinking and then I just. Lose my shit. Like. I can‚Äôt even control it. It just happens and I don‚Äôt realize it until after.
I updated with a comment

So I ended up cutting on the angles with a dremel. Worked that out by cutting the silicone in the corners side to side. Then pulled hard. Like. Really hard. Tried numerous ways to remove the front part of the acrylic. No go. I ended up using pliers to break it apart. The. The glass I used a razor carefully on each spot they were siliconed and wala. I think it took just about four hours total but that was a lot of me standing there going wth. Oh. And be careful for anyone that tries. The glass dividers are sharp and cut deep quite fast. My hand and wrist are cut up but I‚Äôm done.
My hands are small but still pretty beat up. I can‚Äôt quite get in the corner so I think an xacto blade might be a better option

Shortly after posting a friend said dremel out the acrylic. So that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm doing. I‚Äôll let you know how it works. I‚Äôve the the two angled sides off in about half an hour and three cut off disks. Just came in for a razor to get the edges of the rest and it should be probably another hour

Ask her what you can do to help? Tell her you don‚Äôt know what she needs right now because you guys aren‚Äôt communicating it. Have her shower and you do naps for a week. See how things go so she can relax. Then do some of her work and get a little break from nap time. That seems to be where the issue starts. For mine I admit I‚Äôve been stressed being a single mom. So yesterday my boyfriend got butt duty when my son pooped(not his kid but he was super willing even though he didn‚Äôt want to, mines 4). They had a talk about how neither of them really wanted him to wipe him and that seemed to help and my son let him. It‚Äôs a struggle because at his dads house he said he‚Äôs not wiped. So I am literally the only one that wipes him and slowly working on other people helping him
I too am with someone amazing. It really makes you wonder how on earth we fell for the lies
I have nothing nice to say about my ex lmfao. He‚Äôs one of the worst people I know. Idk how I ever thought he was a decent person cause once I was prego, the real him came out.
Mine. I didn‚Äôt see it in the post where her lawyer said the same thing my bad

They are always out and about so tbh. I‚Äôd believe it if they all did. I‚Äôm answering with my experience with asking what would be the best route. Then added that part because nobody‚Äôs gonna say right away they are pretty sure they have it. So it‚Äôs best to keep everyone away if possible

So I talked with my lawyer and I was told i have to abide by the court order. So today he was here and then said he‚Äôs pretty sure they all have covid. All being. His mom. His fling. Their twins his sister and him. All in a 2 br 900 square foot house. But. It doesn‚Äôt matter because it‚Äôs his time. My parents are both in their 60s and we live with them.
For him it‚Äôs an hour drive and he‚Äôs missed a few court dates.

Omg. Mine. Please don‚Äôt be jumping on the couch. Why? I can do what I want. I let it go and not a minute later his foot was stuck in the couch. My reply? I wanted you to stop before you got hurt like this. His answer. Oh. Okay.

Mine is four. He‚Äôs always asking why. Why do I want him to try going to the bathroom? Generally my answer is. You‚Äôre wiggling or dancing so I‚Äôd like you to try so there is no accident. Why do I want him to not scream in my ear? Because i value my hearing. Why  do I want him to stop throwing toys? Because they could break. Why do I want him to eat at the table? Because I don‚Äôt want larder beetles in my bedroom. The list goes on. I‚Äôm sure there will be more that get harder to answer
You my friend. Have a definite keeper!!! Hold onto him tight because he is the best thing ever. Idk what mine would do if I spilled but I‚Äôm sure he wouldn‚Äôt care

He would also have to travel to her courthouse I believe. For us, my ex needs to come to my county as it‚Äôs our sons county of residency so that‚Äôs the courthouse we go thru. The effort of him traveling for it would probably not be worth it to him
If he tries make sure you share that text. Also. I‚Äôd block him on everything possible and send him that screenshot reminding him of what he chose
It got so much better. And now my insurance denied refills
Uh. I do this. Once a farted in his face. Purely accidental. And he just laughed.
No. It‚Äôs not. Because they put on an act that they aren‚Äôt. It‚Äôs called narcissistic
Have her do videos for each kid at 16 18 21 and graduation!!! And/or letters written to the for each as well

Mental health is not a fucking joke. The rest I could handle. But touch MY PRESCRIPTION and I‚Äôll loose my shit. Unless you‚Äôre handing it to me or I asked you to put it somewhere, don‚Äôt fucking touch my meds. I‚Äôm on birth control and bupropion. My boyfriend knows about both and when he‚Äôs around does really good about reminding me to take it. He has touched my bup once. My birth control he will pick up from the pharmacy. That‚Äôs the extent he touches them. Nobody else does. Honestly. I‚Äôd sit her down. Tell her your mental health is where you draw the line. Any other pranks are okay, but that you‚Äôre really not happy with this recent one and you‚Äôd rather she held off for awhile.

It‚Äôs not you. It‚Äôs them. That I can promise you. For the longest time I blamed myself. It took an almost three year break for me to realize I wasn‚Äôt the problem. I just chose shitty people. They lied. Tricked me. And that‚Äôs not my fault for wanting to believe they were good guys. They lied to me to think they were.

I know how you‚Äôre feeling. And it does get better. I was cheated on in my first two relationships. Both were shit. Now I have someone amazing and I know without a doubt he loves me. He has eyes for only me. I haven‚Äôt wondered in about 4 months if he‚Äôs ever going to cheat. We‚Äôve been together almost 10. I trust him 100%. First time I was cheated on was 2011. Second 2014. Same with the third. The fourth and fifth times were in 2015. The last four I was pregnant. I didn‚Äôt find out about the last two until last year though. The first two I found the messages and he ran to Texas for two weeks. Refused to explain or anything. His answer to the messages of her waiting in bed for him? ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs crazy and I‚Äôm not sleeping with her‚Äù. Basically. They fucked up and lost someone loyal as fuck and that‚Äôs on them. It‚Äôs never our faults when we are cheated on. I beat myself up for years, but it‚Äôs all on them for cheating.   You will come out stronger in the end. It might take time. Basically. Don‚Äôt give up hope. Someone will realize your worth and do nothing that would hurt you. And she will be perfect. You will never doubt her. You will know you can trust her. And you will be inexplicably happy.
If you know you‚Äôve been exposed I believe they will test

I‚Äôm not sure where else to really post. But what are you single parents doing? I have a four year old. Safer at home, no kids no families in stores, and social distancing all male it impossible for me to go shopping. I can‚Äôt take my son to my sisters like I normally would. I can‚Äôt take him to the store. My Walmart only gives me same day or next day option for grocery pick up(some local women say they can see out two weeks in theirs and nothing is available). Idk what to even do and I‚Äôm on the verge of just losing control on everything. I can‚Äôt order online as online I can‚Äôt use foodstamps. I get 240 a month for support. I‚Äôm in a dark place mentally. I feel like we don‚Äôt matter. I don‚Äôt file taxes so no stimulus for us(plus my ex claimed our son this year anyways so I still wouldn‚Äôt get anything). I‚Äôm just. Lost.
28 with a 4 year old. I have no fucking clue what I‚Äôm doing yet. You just do what you feel is best as hopefully we don‚Äôt screw our kids up in the process of keeping them alive!!
My only worry with this would be. Running up and down the steps to turn things on and off in time before overflowing
It would be pretty expensive to run that much pipe unfortunately
Mine did this once. Yup. He had fleas so it felt great.
Nope. My bedroom. Only faucet they‚Äôd work on is the kitchen which is downstairs and opposite end of the house
Oh. I should add my tanks are 20 gallon longs a 20 hex two 5 gallons and a 10
Nope. Haven‚Äôt found one that‚Äôs 500 feet and can go up a flight of stairs ü§£
You do not have to! Sleep on the floor or the couch or even a friends place!
That‚Äôs one reason I asked. I‚Äôm hoping someone has one they just 110% love and would buy again if they need to.
I have a tank on the floor and it‚Äôs a lot of work to clean

So this made me tear up. I‚Äôm lucky enough with my son it was a 3 minute drive at 15 mph because every bump hurt. Bad. 5am right before morning traffic on a Tuesday. Only had one light to worry about

Wait. What‚Äôs his email. I‚Äôm a single parent of an amazing but sassy 4 year old who‚Äôs dad isn‚Äôt in the picture other than child support and a few hours every other weekend. He‚Äôs also a narcissist so single parent was easier. I mean. I have an amazing boyfriend. But free money I think he‚Äôd be okay with this lol

So to be honest. I‚Äôve been like this for about a week. Physically drained. Cough. Occasionally my lungs are basically going. What the fuck don‚Äôt forget to breathe. Reading comments my resting heart rate when I first wake up(thanks Fitbit) is usually right around 80-84.my sinuses were really congested yesterday and the day before. But also really dry and had nonstop nosebleeds last night. I had diarrhea for a few days at the beginning of this exhaustion but passed all this off as a med I started just about a month ago(March 4th I believe) now I‚Äôm wondering if these horrid headaches are more than dehydration.

So. With mine who‚Äôs four now...I look at him. He will say he‚Äôs crabby. And I‚Äôll be all. Oh. We gotta tickle the cranky away. He always laughs. When I stop he‚Äôs still a crank. So I‚Äôm like oh. You‚Äôre still crabby. I have to tickle you again. Eventually he says I‚Äôm not cranky anymore or whatever mood he was in. Just getting him to laugh really helps
This. My first thought is. Divorce. Show your daughter cheating never ends well. Show her that you know you deserve to be treated well. Loved. Children model us.
I had one similar. Named him churro.

I always hear my boyfriend out. My 4 year old loves him. Basically. My boyfriend is fun ‚Äúparent‚Äù because I‚Äôm the rule setter. He only need enforce them. So what I would do in your shoes is step back. Don‚Äôt rush moving in yet. Wait awhile.

Oh I know. My ex was this way. I realized being military just reinforced it and made it worse than it was. I only knew him after discharge but his mom and sister both said it changed him for the worse. He admitted to everyone he enlisted so he could be killed. Got sent to Korea instead and the fact it wasn‚Äôt Iraq apparently wrecked everything for him so he basically just hates the world now.

Flip side. Him controlling could be partially due to deployment and not being able to control his own life. Told to do everything pretty much. Now he wants to have control and doesn‚Äôt care who it is. I‚Äôd tell him get help now, and you‚Äôd consider staying there a little longer. But not more than a year because you mentally just. Can‚Äôt. If he doesnt seek help in the next day. Three months, you know his decision.
Conveniently forget your phone at home or at your boyfriends place

Oh. I lost my shit and full on rage when mine was about 16 weeks. Sleep regression. I never ever hurt him or thought about it either. I was essentially a single mom from the day he was brought home til now. He‚Äôs 4. I found wearing him worked the best because he was near me and would be almost. Delirious. I used the boba wrap because it was much more comfortable. And being near him really helped me not end up so upset because I was still hands free but he was getting what he needed. Babies need the closeness. Added bonus. I could do it shirtless and I was fully covered and we still got skin on skin.
I agree. Checking on the cat also probably helps with distraction, even just for the moment

It took me almost three years before it didn‚Äôt hurt. My ex cheated because he wasn‚Äôt getting what he wanted so i left. My son will be 5 this coming August. I‚Äôve been dating someone amazing since June last year and he was very understanding about taking it easy just in case it still hurt. He is bigger than my ex(almost twice as long and a hair thicker) and it never hurt once because he cared enough to go slow until I was good for more. Have you tried being on top so you can go at your pace? That might help. Editing to add, I had a severe second degree tear(I literally asked while my pb was seeing me up) and asked how many stitches that means. They do basically a running stitch so technically it was one, but the amount used was equal to 10. It got infected twice.
Nope. I let him sulk.
Idk. When my boyfriend starts avoiding me I don‚Äôt push it. I call him out and that‚Äôs it.
For me, I was cheated on and tried to make excuses. Never make excuses for someone else‚Äôs behavior because you cannot control it. Now I‚Äôve learned and it‚Äôs definitely helped some

Well. Who cares about looks if you‚Äôre the best in every other possible way. For me, my ex‚Äôs probably aren‚Äôt the best looking to most. But I don‚Äôt love someone for looks. But their looks definitely grow on me and I see zero faults in how they look. Your personality will ALWAYS be better than Brocks beautiful feet(insert gag here)

Part of coming from abuse is being more alert to tiny movements. It‚Äôs not fair to you, but. You can help him by encouraging therapy, trying to remember not to move too fast, and just reminding him constantly that you care and would never hit him for any reason. My rule with myself is if I ever feel like I need to hit someone for basically no reason, I‚Äôll leave. I don‚Äôt want to be that person so I remind my boyfriend I will never hit him. I draw the line at cheating. I will deck him for that, but I fully trust him to tell me his needs and wants before he would get to the point of wanting to cheat.
I‚Äôm sorry. I‚Äôm laughing super hard and also scared of how right she unfortunately was. You‚Äôll never hear the end of it because sHe WaS rIgHt.
The bedtime story part is unusual but I agree. Reading some things together before other things can definitely make things more fun
Uhm how old were you two when this happened? I‚Äôm laughing super hard because what would she expect at any age over like. 10 for a bedtime story

Don‚Äôt go by what could be. Go by what is. Living with what could be, I was miserable. He‚Äôs now my ex. I‚Äôm now with someone who is amazing. Not could be amazing. He is 1000% amazing. We have our fights and whatnot but they definitely aren‚Äôt as bad as when I based my relationships on what he could be.

I mean. I get it. For me my only worry is that they won‚Äôt be able to fill mine for a few days. As it is it‚Äôs never ready 4 days early like it was last time I was on birth control. Now it‚Äôs ready the day I need to start a new pack. Luckily they now give me three at a time

You‚Äôre getting sick. Doesn‚Äôt matter what it is, you shouldn‚Äôt be around other people in case you get more sick or get them sick. Her guests would not be happy if they weren‚Äôt told you‚Äôre sick and they show up
I had some at one point. But the bettas are killers

Honestly. Mine was 4 when I started testing the waters. I‚Äôm not dating an amazing guy and it‚Äôs been almost 9 months. He loves my son and my son loves him. Basically been willing to play with him since day one. They go on walks. They go to the store. He takes him for ice cream. He takes him to the park. And I get a break! It‚Äôs really amazing. When we want to do something my sister or my parents usually watch him. He‚Äôs never had an actual sitter so I can‚Äôt help on that and we quit breastfeeding at about 2.5 years.
I vape. No changes in that yet
Today is day three. Yesterday I was motivated and today o even went for a walk around the block. Definitely better.
Also following from Wisconsin. Been following almost since I joined!
I swear I‚Äôll hear my mom calling up the steps for me.

Mine is also four. He has zero interest in anything learning wise. So we watch the adventure agents on YouTube. He learns how to be safe outdoors, camping was fun for him when we went for his birthday weekend this past August. He helped find wood for fires. He made his own smore. Basically. Since day one I‚Äôve let him figure out things on his own, and in the last year learned about unschooling. I loosely follow radical unschooling with no screen restriction(I have him on YouTube kids for only pre approved channels)

Mine is now four. He had me wide awake last night. I rearranged my bed to be off the wall. He was sleeping on it, rolled over with the top half hanging off. He wakes up. Says wow. Mom you‚Äôre a bedhog. Flopped face first into his mattress below and says there. You can hog the bed. Idk what happened but I didn‚Äôt fall asleep for around 4 hours after that.

Had something similar happen to me one night. White suv flies past me and I‚Äôm like fuck dude. This area is known for cops waiting. Not more I thought that and cop flies past. Never heard or saw lights. Nothing. He must have flipped the lights on in my blind spot. Instant karma. And to this day I still laugh about it
Good question! I‚Äôm also curious if anyone has been able to stay friends with active users and not relapse. I‚Äôm going to add that
Peppa pig has an episode about casts
YouTube kids!! You can choose the content and no safari! Use it with my 4 year old now

And the crazy itching! Mine was a severe second degree. I‚Äôd literally drag myself on the floor to relieve the itch. Worked great when mine would get cranky. I‚Äôd sit on the floor and rock him by wigging my hips. Covert. Yes.
I‚Äôm envious! Such a gorgeous long finned girl!
She definitely doesn‚Äôt want her to. Who‚Äôs gonna go buy her soda and snacks? Who‚Äôs gonna do laundry or clean?

My thinking is, she would be required to go to therapy and find help. no reasons to back out of anything that she actually needs. I cannot take her on currently as I have a 4 year old. My brother works 14 hour days and has a farm an hour away. I feel like foster care would really be for the best as being placed out could be a fresh start with new people.

In my sisters will it‚Äôs me. And if I can‚Äôt it‚Äôs my brother. She was In Therapy, I was taking her every week. My sister decided it was a waste of time for me to be taking her out of school for them.
We have. They haven‚Äôt done anything. We‚Äôve had numerous well checks done as well

It‚Äôs not even just her. It‚Äôs the fact my sister just doesn‚Äôt care. Hasn‚Äôt for four years. She lays in bed pretty much all day while my nieces are there taking care of the house. The one just turned 19 but she‚Äôs mentally handicapped and at second grade level mentally.
I had to pick her up from school and the officer said possession charges are pending
Ahh true. But it‚Äôs not really meddling. It‚Äôs my government phone she was using to get it. I‚Äôm more her parent than her mom is
Mine completely ignored me. For a year and a half. Then suddenly wanted custody
Oo. I‚Äôll throw in. Customs? Lol. Sorry feeling like a creeper now. It‚Äôs late and we are headed to bed. But custom would be epic.
I feel like I saw this in another post today. And I loved it. That or brainlessly scrolling here. Either way you should make and sell these edit to delete some stuff. Yes. It was another post.

Omg. That last one. My mom legit said that exact thing. It‚Äôs trading one addiction for a legal one. And it pissed me off. I said no, from what I‚Äôve learned it‚Äôs trading in addiction and getting help because you want better. If someone isn‚Äôt ready to be a quitter, they are not going to turn to methadone.

Having never done anything considered ‚Äúbad‚Äù by the general public, I love learning in this sub. It‚Äôs helped me to understand better than I use to. I give huge kudos to anyone that chooses MMT as help to turn their lives around. I honestly, until joining here, legit thought it was basically a legal way to get high and that‚Äôs why people chose it. Now learning more, I‚Äôve realized it‚Äôs much more than that. That it can be a good thing much more often than a bad thing. That there‚Äôs a ton of rules and stuff. It‚Äôs not very easy to get on it and those that are persistent are determined to do better for themselves. Thank you for your story as well as that really helps me to understand from others points of view and not just my own
Ahh. Yes. That‚Äôs definitely easier to understand! Thanks!

So I‚Äôm not on MMT but dating someone who is. No judgement, but why compare MMT to something the body actually needs like insulin? I for the life of me can‚Äôt see how it‚Äôs a fair comparison I do want to learn and understand
Following because my boyfriend thinks I think this. Little more to dig into
I love the marbles!!

This. When it‚Äôs unexpected it‚Äôs harder. My grandma died a few years ago, we had a two week warning yet knew she was struggling for a few years. When she gave up she went fast. She‚Äôs no longer in pain. No longer suffering. She couldn‚Äôt sit for very long before her back would hurt(cancer in her spine, can‚Äôt remember what kind) she was very miserable and fought that for I wanna say three years. She deserves peace. She fought for a long time and was in remission for I wanna say 10-14 years before it came back. She lived 23 years(a few more days would have been 24) without my grandpa. Now they are together and happy. My uncle died suddenly and my aunt is still a wreck. That was 4 years ago. Knowing gives time to prepare for everyone. It‚Äôs a huge difference.

You should honor his wishes. He was the one you vowed to love cherish and all that. He‚Äôd want you happy. Don‚Äôt let her drag you down. Tell her he wished for you to be happy and try to love a normal life. What better way to mourn than make sure you take care of yourself?? Also. I have no other words than. She‚Äôs dumb. Yes. Be relieved he‚Äôs no longer suffering, fighting, or in pain. But it‚Äôs also okay to not be okay some days. Just take those days for you if you need to.

I‚Äôll add. She could say ‚ÄúI‚Äôve noticed you‚Äôre not doing your equal share. Do you want me to help remind you some days? I know it‚Äôs hard to be motivated to do X some days but it‚Äôs even harder for me to feel like I‚Äôm not being heard on this again‚Äù or ‚Äúit seems like this is getting harder, I‚Äôll swap you this so you can do that if you‚Äôd like‚Äù. My boyfriend isn‚Äôt much of a cleaner and either as I. But I don‚Äôt mind doing washing and drying, and he doesn‚Äôt mind folding and dishes. We have this already figured out for when we move in together. Pretty sure the rest of the cleaning will fall to me, but as long as I don‚Äôt have to do dishes, I don‚Äôt really mind since I do stay home with my 4 year old son(previous relationship) and my man is good about spending time with him so I also get to just relax a lot when he‚Äôs around. It‚Äôs really just about balance.
Done and done. Glad I saw this because I didn‚Äôt even realize I was doing it!

So iPhones of you hit the power button 5 times really fast. It does this. Weird noise even turned off. So awkward convo when he shows up and he‚Äôs the guy I‚Äôve dubbed the hot cop. Needless to say basically telling him I was pissed at my phone for freezing we had a good laugh.
It really doesn‚Äôt. It‚Äôs hard because I am quite sarcastic at times

I definitely do. I don‚Äôt really like talking to people face to face so I‚Äôm trying to make it happen so i can work through it. Online is definitely easier because heck. Idk who they are most of the time so if I say something stupid, I can be like. Hahahahaha sorry. My sarcasm is dumb.
*piece? (Taking a crack at the puzzle joke)

Don‚Äôt go for emotionally connecting. For for mentally connecting. For me, I trust no one except my current boyfriend and myself, due to my nex. We mentally connected the first night talking. We talked for a month daily before meeting. It was hard work pushing myself some days. Basically. My ex tried to rule my life. Now he can‚Äôt, and he‚Äôs noticed that. So things are only about our son. I have anxiety on top of the stuff he caused, so I get you. If you ever wanna just talk to rant or compare approaches or whatever, I‚Äôm pretty much always around
Very true. I‚Äôll be following to make sure no more of mine end up there
